mapper.select: SELECT dlv.dlv_no ,dlv.product_no ,dlv.splr_no ,dlv.loginID ,dlv.dlv_amt ,dlv.dlv_date ,dlv.appro_no ,dlv.appro_bos ,pd.product_name ,pd.product_unit_price ,sp.splr_name ,sb.acnt_sbject_name ,ds.acnt_dt_sbjct_name ,FORMAT(CAST(pd.product_unit_price * dlv.dlv_amt AS DECIMAL), 0) AS expen_price FROM tb_dlv dlv INNER JOIN tb_product pd ON pd.product_no = dlv.product_no INNER JOIN tb_splr sp ON sp.splr_no = dlv.splr_no INNER JOIN tb_appro ap ON ap.appro_no = dlv.appro_no INNER JOIN tb_acnt_sbject sb ON sb.acnt_sbject_cd = dlv.acnt_sbject_cd INNER JOIN tb_dt_sbject ds ON ds.acnt_dt_sbject_cd = dlv.acnt_dt_sbject_cd INNER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON ui.loginID = dlv.loginID where dlv.appro_no = #{appro_no}
